name: analyze_protein_conservation
description: Perform multiple sequence alignment and phylogenetic analysis to identify conserved protein regions.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: protein_sequences
inputs.description: List of protein sequences in FASTA format from multiple organisms

output.description: Research log summarizing sequence alignment and conservation analysis
